Function_Description: Primary call-to-action button that opens file browser dialog. Allows users to select PDF files from disk. Initializes PDF parsing and store updates.
Expected_Behavior: File browser dialog opens, user selects PDF file, document loads in canvas and tab bar
Actual_Behavior: File dialog opens, PDF loads successfully, document appears in main canvas

Function_Description: Dropdown menu trigger button that shows/hides File menu options. Handles file operations like open, save, print, convert, close.
Expected_Behavior: Menu appears with 12 options: Open, Recent, Save, Save As, Print, Export, Download Log, Document Properties, Close
Actual_Behavior: Menu displays correctly with all options functional

Function_Description: Opens native file picker dialog filtered for .pdf files. Accepts single PDF selection. Triggers PDF loading process into document store.
Expected_Behavior: File picker dialog opens with PDF filter, selected file loads into editor, document tab appears
Actual_Behavior: File dialog opens, PDF loads, tab created successfully

Function_Description: Displays list of recently opened PDF files. Clicking item reloads document. Stores file paths in browser localStorage. Max 10 recent files.
Expected_Behavior: Recent files list appears with file names and timestamps, clicking opens file immediately
Actual_Behavior: Recent files displayed correctly, files open on click

Function_Description: Saves current PDF with all applied modifications (highlights, text edits, image edits, annotations). Uses pdf-lib to apply modifications. Downloads file.
Expected_Behavior: Modified PDF saved with all annotations intact, file downloads to user downloads folder
Actual_Behavior: PDF saves with all edits applied correctly

Function_Description: Opens prompt dialog for custom filename. Validates filename format. Saves PDF with new name. Maintains all modifications from current session.
Expected_Behavior: Prompt shows current filename, user enters new name, PDF downloads with custom filename
Actual_Behavior: Prompt appears, custom name accepted, file downloads correctly

Function_Description: Exports modified PDF preserving all changes. Uses canvas rendering and PDF library. Same as Save PDF. Alternative download method.
Expected_Behavior: Modified PDF with all edits exported and downloaded

Function_Description: Exports current PDF page as PNG image. Uses canvas2image library. Renders page at current zoom level. Downloads PNG file with page number.
Expected_Behavior: Current page rendered as PNG, downloads with filename format: [docname]_page_[number].png
Actual_Behavior: PNG exports correctly with proper filename

Function_Description: Exports current PDF page as JPEG image. Uses canvas2image library. Converts canvas to lossy JPEG format. Downloads JPG file.
Expected_Behavior: Current page rendered as JPG, downloads with filename format: [docname]_page_[number].jpg

Function_Description: Opens browser print dialog. Renders PDF in hidden iframe. Uses browser print engine. Supports OS-level printer selection.
Expected_Behavior: Print dialog opens with PDF preview, user selects printer and settings, document prints

Function_Description: Closes current active document. Removes document from tabs. Removes document from Zustand store. Cleans up associated data and state.
Expected_Behavior: Active document closed, tab removed from tab bar, document removed from store

Function_Description: Opens modal dialog showing PDF metadata. Fields: Title, Author, Subject, Keywords. All fields editable. Changes apply to document metadata only.
Expected_Behavior: Modal appears with 4 editable text fields, changes save on confirm
Actual_Behavior: Modal opens, fields editable, changes save

Function_Description: Generates and downloads session activity log. Contains all user actions timestamp. Format: plaintext. Filename: pdf-editor-log-[timestamp].txt
Expected_Behavior: Log file downloaded with complete session history
Actual_Behavior: Log file downloads with timestamp in filename

Function_Description: Activates hand/grab tool for PDF navigation. Click and drag to pan through document. Disables text selection. Icon: open hand cursor.
Expected_Behavior: Tool activated, cursor changes to grab hand, click-drag pans document

Function_Description: Activates text/object selection tool. Click to select text, drag for selection box. Enables text copying. Enables annotation deletion.
Expected_Behavior: Tool activated, cursor shows pointer, text selectable, annotations can be deleted

Function_Description: Enables text editing mode. Click existing text to edit. Triple-click selects line. Supports text formatting: font, size, color.
Expected_Behavior: Text editing mode activated, click text to open editor, changes apply to PDF
Actual_Behavior: Text editing works, format options available

Function_Description: Enables image editing mode. Click to draw selection box around image. Opens image editor modal with adjustment controls.
Expected_Behavior: Image mode activated, draw box around image, modal opens with controls

Function_Description: Adds new text box to PDF. Click anywhere on canvas to place text. Modal opens for text content and formatting input.
Expected_Behavior: Mode activated, click on PDF opens text input modal, text added to page

Function_Description: Inserts image into PDF page. Opens file picker for image selection. Supports PNG, JPG formats. Scales image to fit page.
Expected_Behavior: File picker opens, select image, image placed on current page at click location

Function_Description: Text highlighting tool with color selection. Drag to select text, highlight applied. Default color: yellow. 4 colors available: Yellow, Green, Blue, Red.
Expected_Behavior: Drag over text, highlight overlay applied, color matches selection

Function_Description: Changes highlight color to yellow (#FFD700). Affects all new highlights until changed. Does not retroactively change existing highlights.
Expected_Behavior: Color picker updates to yellow, subsequent highlights appear yellow

Function_Description: Changes highlight color to green (#00CC00). Affects all new highlights. User selects from color palette dropdown.
Expected_Behavior: Color picker updates to green, subsequent highlights appear green

Function_Description: Changes highlight color to blue (#0066CC). Affects all new highlights. Color palette dropdown selection.
Expected_Behavior: Color picker updates to blue, subsequent highlights appear blue

Function_Description: Changes highlight color to red (#FF0000). Affects all new highlights. Color palette dropdown selection.
Expected_Behavior: Color picker updates to red, subsequent highlights appear red

Function_Description: Text underline annotation tool. Drag to select text, underline applied. Color matches current highlight color setting.
Expected_Behavior: Select text, underline appears under selected text

Function_Description: Text strikethrough annotation tool. Drag to select text, strikethrough line applied. Permanent modification to text.
Expected_Behavior: Select text, line struck through text

Function_Description: Combines multiple PDF files into single document. Opens file picker for multi-select (Ctrl+click). Merges in selection order. Creates new combined PDF.
Expected_Behavior: File picker opens allowing multiple PDF selection, files merge in order selected, new PDF created

Function_Description: Reduces PDF file size using compression algorithm. Maintains document quality. Applies to current document. Downloads compressed version.
Expected_Behavior: Compression algorithm applies, file size reduces, quality maintained, downloads

Function_Description: Rotates current page 90 degrees counter-clockwise. Updates page display immediately. Rotation persists when saved.
Expected_Behavior: Current page rotates counter-clockwise 90 degrees, display updates

Function_Description: Rotates current page 90 degrees clockwise. Updates page display immediately. Rotation persists when saved.
Expected_Behavior: Current page rotates clockwise 90 degrees, display updates

Function_Description: Deletes current page from PDF. Shows confirmation dialog. Reduces page count. Updates page counter.
Expected_Behavior: Confirmation dialog appears, page deleted on confirm, page count updates

Function_Description: Adds blank page to PDF after current page. Updates page count. New page available for editing.
Expected_Behavior: Blank page inserted after current page, page count increases, new page displayed

Function_Description: Adds password protection to PDF. Opens modal for password input. Requires password confirmation. Encryption persists in saved file.
Expected_Behavior: Modal appears, user enters password twice, PDF encrypted on confirm

Function_Description: Controls print permission for PDF. Toggle button enables/disables printing. Setting applies to encrypted document.
Expected_Behavior: Toggle activated, print permission set, affects encrypted PDF

Function_Description: Controls copy permission for PDF. Toggle button enables/disables text copying. Setting applies to encrypted document.
Expected_Behavior: Toggle activated, copy permission set, affects PDF

Function_Description: Controls modification permission for PDF. Toggle button enables/disables document editing. Setting applies to encrypted document.
Expected_Behavior: Toggle activated, modify permission set, affects PDF

Function_Description: Adds digital signature to PDF (Coming Soon). Feature not yet implemented. Placeholder button shown in Protect menu.
Expected_Behavior: Button shown but non-functional, feature scheduled for future release

Function_Description: Permanently removes sensitive text/content from PDF. Draw selection box around content to redact. Content replaced with black box.
Expected_Behavior: Redaction mode activated, draw box around sensitive text, content replaced with black rectangle

Function_Description: Converts PDF to Microsoft Word (.docx) format. Feature disabled on Alpine Linux due to pdf2docx dependency. Shows 'Not Implemented' error message.
Expected_Behavior: Button appears disabled (grayed out), clicking shows error: 'Word conversion not available'
Error_Details: Alpine Linux compatibility: pdf2docx requires native build tools

Function_Description: Converts PDF to Microsoft Excel (.xlsx) format. Uses backend py_word_excel_html_ppt.py script. Pipeline: PDF → Word → Excel. Preserves tables and formatting.
Expected_Behavior: Conversion dialog shows Excel button active, clicking initiates conversion, Excel file downloads

Function_Description: Converts PDF to Microsoft PowerPoint (.pptx) format. Uses backend py_word_excel_html_ppt.py script. Creates professional slides with proper pagination.
Expected_Behavior: Conversion dialog shows PowerPoint button active, clicking initiates conversion, PowerPoint file downloads

Function_Description: Converts PDF to HTML format. Uses backend py_word_excel_html_ppt.py script. Renders pages as images and embeds as base64. Preserves pixel-perfect layout.
Expected_Behavior: Conversion dialog shows HTML button active, clicking initiates conversion, HTML file downloads

Function_Description: Extracts text content from PDF to plaintext (.txt) file. Uses backend pdf_to_text.py script. Preserves text structure and line breaks.
Expected_Behavior: Conversion initiated, text extraction processes, TXT file downloads with extracted content

Function_Description: Recognizes text from scanned PDF pages. Uses Tesseract OCR engine. Extracts text from image-based PDFs. Makes scanned documents searchable.
Expected_Behavior: OCR mode activated, scanned pages analyzed, text extracted and added to searchable layer

Function_Description: Opens/closes side panel for adding comments and annotations. Panel appears on right side of screen. Allows text note input. Notes persist in session.
Expected_Behavior: Comments panel toggles visible/hidden, appears on right side, allows comment entry

Function_Description: Freehand drawing tool for annotations. Click to start drawing. Drag to create freehand lines. Color and width customizable.
Expected_Behavior: Drawing mode activated, freehand lines draw on canvas, color and width apply

Function_Description: Drawing tool to create rectangle shapes. Click and drag to define rectangle. Shape has selection handles. Fully customizable color and stroke.
Expected_Behavior: Shape mode set to rectangle, drag on canvas creates rectangle with handles

Function_Description: Drawing tool to create circle/ellipse shapes. Click and drag to define circle. Shape has selection handles. Customizable appearance.
Expected_Behavior: Shape mode set to circle, drag on canvas creates circle with handles

Function_Description: Drawing tool to create straight lines. Click start point, click end point to draw. Can adjust endpoints. Customizable color and width.
Expected_Behavior: Shape mode set to line, click start and end points creates line between them

Function_Description: Adds sticky note annotations to PDF page. Click to place note. Modal opens for note content. Notes are yellow by default. Deletable.
Expected_Behavior: Note mode activated, click on page opens note input, yellow note appears on page

Function_Description: Full-text search across entire PDF. Opens search bar with input field. Highlights all matches. Provides match counter. Navigate matches with arrows.
Expected_Behavior: Search bar appears, type search term, matches highlighted and counted, navigation arrows functional

Function_Description: Opens modal showing detailed document information. Displays: File size, page count, dimensions, creation date, modification date, metadata.
Expected_Behavior: Modal opens with comprehensive document info displayed

Function_Description: Removes all metadata and hidden data from PDF. Strips author info, creation date, thumbnails. Cleans embedded files. Returns sanitized PDF.
Expected_Behavior: Sanitization processes document, removes all metadata, downloads clean version

Function_Description: Adds text watermark to all PDF pages. Opens modal for watermark text input. Applies transparency. Watermark appears behind content.
Expected_Behavior: Watermark mode opens, user enters text, watermark applied to all pages with transparency

Function_Description: Navigates to previous page in PDF. Button disabled on page 1. Updates page counter and display.
Expected_Behavior: Button enabled (except page 1), clicking navigates to previous page, page counter updates

Function_Description: Navigates to next page in PDF. Button disabled on last page. Updates page counter and display.
Expected_Behavior: Button enabled (except last page), clicking navigates to next page, page counter updates

Function_Description: Input field to jump directly to specific page number. Enter page number and press Enter. Validates page number within range.
Expected_Behavior: Input field accepts numbers, pressing Enter navigates to page, invalid numbers rejected

Function_Description: Decreases PDF zoom level by 10%. Minimum zoom: 50%. Updates zoom percentage display. Adjusts canvas rendering accordingly.
Expected_Behavior: Zoom percentage decreases by 10%, display updates, minimum 50% enforced

Function_Description: Displays current zoom percentage (e.g., 100%, 150%). Updates when zoom changes. Read-only display. Shows real-time zoom value.
Expected_Behavior: Current zoom percentage displayed and updates on zoom changes

Function_Description: Increases PDF zoom level by 10%. Maximum zoom: 300%. Updates zoom percentage display. Adjusts canvas rendering accordingly.
Expected_Behavior: Zoom percentage increases by 10%, display updates, maximum 300% enforced

Function_Description: Thumbnail preview of page 1. Click to navigate to page 1. Shows miniature page layout. Highlights active page.
Expected_Behavior: Thumbnail displayed, clicking navigates to page 1, active page highlighted

Function_Description: Thumbnail preview of any page. Click to navigate. Shows miniature page layout. Highlights active page. Scrollable list.
Expected_Behavior: Thumbnails display for all pages, clicking navigates to page, active page highlighted

Function_Description: Right-click context menu on thumbnail. Option to delete page. Shows confirmation dialog. Page removed from PDF.
Expected_Behavior: Right-click shows menu, delete option appears, confirmation dialog shown, page deleted

Function_Description: Drag thumbnail to reorder pages. Drop in new position. Updates page order. Modal shows reorder confirmation.
Expected_Behavior: Drag thumbnail to new position, drop initiates reorder, modal shows preview, order updates

Function_Description: Main canvas area displaying PDF page content. Renders text, images, and annotations. Updates on page navigation. Supports zoom.
Expected_Behavior: PDF page displays with all content: text, images, annotations. Responsive to navigation and zoom.

Function_Description: Text selection on canvas. Click and drag to select text. Selected text highlighted. Enables copy functionality.
Expected_Behavior: Text dragged to select, highlighted in blue, can be copied to clipboard

Function_Description: Right-click on selected text shows context menu. Copy option copies text to clipboard. Supports keyboard Ctrl+C.
Expected_Behavior: Right-click shows menu, copy option appears, text copies to clipboard

Function_Description: Right-click on annotation shows context menu. Delete option removes annotation from page.
Expected_Behavior: Right-click shows menu, delete option removes annotation

Function_Description: Text input field for document title. Editable metadata. Changes apply to document properties.
Expected_Behavior: Title field shown, accepts text input, changes apply on save

Function_Description: Text input field for document author. Editable metadata. Changes apply to document properties.
Expected_Behavior: Author field shown, accepts text input, changes apply on save

Function_Description: Text input field for document subject. Editable metadata. Changes apply to document properties.
Expected_Behavior: Subject field shown, accepts text input, changes apply on save

Function_Description: Text input field for document keywords. Editable metadata. Changes apply to document properties.
Expected_Behavior: Keywords field shown, accepts comma-separated keywords, changes apply on save

Function_Description: Text input area in Add Text modal. Accepts any text content. Supports multi-line input. Character limit: 5000.
Expected_Behavior: Text area shown, accepts text input, supports multiple lines

Function_Description: Dropdown selector for text font size. Options: 8pt to 72pt in 2pt increments. Default: 12pt. Changes apply to added text.
Expected_Behavior: Font size dropdown shown, click to select size, value updates

Function_Description: Color picker for text color. Click to open color palette. Select any RGB color. Preview shown. Applies to text.
Expected_Behavior: Color picker shown, click opens palette, select color, text color updates

Function_Description: Confirm button to add text to PDF. Validates input. Adds text to current page at clicked location. Closes modal.
Expected_Behavior: Confirm button shown, clicking adds text to page, modal closes

Function_Description: Cancel button to close text modal without adding. Discards any entered text. Returns to PDF view.
Expected_Behavior: Cancel button shown, clicking closes modal, text discarded

Function_Description: Preview of selected image in editor. Shows image with selection handles. Displays current adjustments.
Expected_Behavior: Image shown with handles, adjustments visible in real-time

Function_Description: Slider control for image brightness. Range: -100 (dark) to +100 (bright). Default: 0. Real-time preview. Updates image on page.
Expected_Behavior: Brightness slider shown, adjust left/right, image brightness changes in real-time

Function_Description: Slider control for image contrast. Range: -100 (low) to +100 (high). Default: 0. Real-time preview. Updates image on page.
Expected_Behavior: Contrast slider shown, adjust left/right, image contrast changes in real-time

Function_Description: Slider control for image rotation. Range: -180 to +180 degrees. Default: 0. Real-time preview. Updates image on page.
Expected_Behavior: Rotation slider shown, adjust left/right, image rotates in real-time

Function_Description: Save button to apply image edits to PDF. Updates image on page with adjustments. Closes modal.
Expected_Behavior: Save button shown, clicking applies edits to page, modal closes

Function_Description: Cancel button to discard image edits. Closes modal without applying changes. Image remains unchanged.
Expected_Behavior: Cancel button shown, clicking closes modal, edits discarded

Function_Description: Text input field for PDF password. Masked input (dots instead of characters). Supports any character. Minimum 4 characters recommended.
Expected_Behavior: Password field shown, input masked, accepts characters

Function_Description: Text input field to confirm password. Must match first password field. Shows error if mismatch. Validates on input.
Expected_Behavior: Confirm password field shown, must match first entry, error shown if mismatch

Function_Description: Encrypt button applies password protection. Validates matching passwords. Encrypts PDF. Returns encrypted file.
Expected_Behavior: Encrypt button shown, clicking with valid passwords encrypts PDF

Function_Description: Cancel button closes encryption modal. Discards password. PDF remains unencrypted.
Expected_Behavior: Cancel button shown, clicking closes modal, encryption cancelled

Function_Description: Word conversion button (DISABLED). Shows 'Not Available' with explanation. Tooltip explains Alpine Linux limitation.
Expected_Behavior: Button shown grayed out, label 'Not Available', tooltip explains limitation

Function_Description: Excel conversion button. Initiates PDF to Excel conversion. Shows loading indicator. Downloads .xlsx file.
Expected_Behavior: Button shown enabled, clicking initiates conversion, loading shown, Excel file downloads

Function_Description: PowerPoint conversion button. Initiates PDF to PowerPoint conversion. Shows loading indicator. Downloads .pptx file.
Expected_Behavior: Button shown enabled, clicking initiates conversion, loading shown, PowerPoint file downloads

Function_Description: HTML conversion button. Initiates PDF to HTML conversion. Shows loading indicator. Downloads .html file.
Expected_Behavior: Button shown enabled, clicking initiates conversion, loading shown, HTML file downloads

Function_Description: Cancel button closes conversion modal. Returns to PDF view without converting.
Expected_Behavior: Cancel button shown, clicking closes modal

Function_Description: Drag-and-drop interface for reordering pages. Thumbnails shown in a list. Drag thumbnail to new position. Visual feedback on drag.
Expected_Behavior: Thumbnails shown, drag thumbnail to new position, visual feedback (highlight/move indicator)

Function_Description: Save button confirms page reordering. Applies new page order to PDF. Closes modal. Updates page list.
Expected_Behavior: Save button shown, clicking applies new order, modal closes, page order updates

Function_Description: Cancel button discards page reordering. Returns to original order. Closes modal without changes.
Expected_Behavior: Cancel button shown, clicking closes modal, original order restored

Function_Description: Green toast notification shows when conversion succeeds. Message: 'Converted to [format]!'. Auto-dismisses after 4 seconds.
Expected_Behavior: Green toast appears with success message, auto-disappears

Function_Description: Red toast notification shows when conversion fails. Message includes error details. Shows from bottom-right. Auto-dismisses after 6 seconds.
Expected_Behavior: Red toast appears with error message and details, auto-disappears

Function_Description: Orange toast shows during file operations. Shows spinner icon. Message: 'Processing...' or 'Converting...'. Cleared when operation completes.
Expected_Behavior: Orange toast with spinner appears, shows during operation, disappears when done

Function_Description: Blue toast shows informational messages. Message text varies by context. Auto-dismisses after 5 seconds.
Expected_Behavior: Blue toast appears with info message, auto-disappears

Function_Description: Tab for each open document. Click to switch between documents. Shows document filename. Clickable tab area.
Expected_Behavior: Tabs shown for each document, clicking switches active document, filename displayed

Function_Description: X button on each tab to close document. Click X to remove tab and close document. Tooltip shows on hover.
Expected_Behavior: X button shown on each tab, clicking removes document, tooltip appears on hover

Function_Description: Tab shows document filename (e.g., 'report.pdf'). Filename taken from imported file. Helps identify document.
Expected_Behavior: Filename displayed on tab, matches imported document name

Function_Description: Text input area for adding comments. Multi-line support. Character limit: 1000. Placeholder text: 'Add a comment...'
Expected_Behavior: Comment input shown, accepts text, supports multiple lines

Function_Description: Post/Submit button for comment. Validates non-empty input. Adds comment to list with timestamp. Clears input field.
Expected_Behavior: Post button shown, clicking submits comment, added to list with timestamp, input cleared

Function_Description: Edit button on existing comment. Reopens comment in edit mode. Can modify text. Save changes or cancel.
Expected_Behavior: Edit button shown on comment, clicking enables edit mode, text editable, save/cancel options

Function_Description: Delete button on existing comment. Shows confirmation. Removes comment from list. Permanent deletion.
Expected_Behavior: Delete button shown on comment, confirmation shown, comment removed on confirm

Function_Description: Freehand drawing tool. Click and drag to draw. Creates continuous line. Supports undo. Line color and width customizable.
Expected_Behavior: Drawing mode active, click-drag creates freehand line on canvas, undo available

Function_Description: Color picker for pen/drawing color. Opens palette on click. Select from full RGB spectrum. Applied to new drawings.
Expected_Behavior: Color picker shown, click opens palette, select color, subsequent drawings use new color

Function_Description: Slider control for drawing width/thickness. Range: 1px to 20px. Default: 3px. Updates pen thickness in real-time.
Expected_Behavior: Width slider shown, adjust left/right, pen thickness changes for new strokes

Function_Description: Tool to draw rectangle shapes. Click and drag to define rectangle. Shape has handles for resizing. Customizable color.
Expected_Behavior: Rectangle mode active, click-drag creates rectangle with handles

Function_Description: Tool to draw circle/ellipse shapes. Click and drag to define circle. Shape has handles for resizing. Customizable color.
Expected_Behavior: Circle mode active, click-drag creates circle with handles

Function_Description: Tool to draw straight lines. Click start point, click end point. Line has endpoints for adjusting. Customizable color.
Expected_Behavior: Line mode active, click two points creates straight line between them

Function_Description: Eraser tool for removing drawn content. Click and drag to erase. Removes complete strokes. Undo available.
Expected_Behavior: Eraser mode active, click-drag removes drawn content, undo available

Function_Description: Inline text editor appears when double-clicking text. Allows direct text modification. Supports cut/copy/paste operations.
Expected_Behavior: Double-click text opens inline editor, text editable, keyboard shortcuts work

Function_Description: Font size dropdown in inline editor. Options: 8pt to 72pt. Default: current size. Changes apply to selected text.
Expected_Behavior: Font size dropdown shown in editor, select size, text size updates

Function_Description: Color picker in inline editor. Opens palette on click. Select any RGB color. Changes apply to selected text.
Expected_Behavior: Color picker shown in editor, click opens palette, select color, text color updates

Function_Description: Confirm button (checkmark) saves text edits. Applies changes to PDF. Closes inline editor.
Expected_Behavior: Confirm button shown, clicking saves edits, editor closes, changes apply

Function_Description: Cancel button (X) discards text edits. Reverts text to original. Closes inline editor.
Expected_Behavior: Cancel button shown, clicking discards changes, editor closes, text reverted

Function_Description: Vertical scrollbar on main canvas. Appears when content exceeds viewport height. Drag to scroll page vertically. Wheel scroll supported.
Expected_Behavior: Scrollbar appears on right, drag scrolls vertically, mouse wheel works

Function_Description: Horizontal scrollbar below main canvas. Appears when content exceeds viewport width. Drag to scroll page horizontally.
Expected_Behavior: Scrollbar appears at bottom, drag scrolls horizontally, keyboard arrows work

Function_Description: Vertical scrollbar in thumbnail panel. Scrolls through page thumbnails. Appears when more pages than panel height.
Expected_Behavior: Scrollbar appears in thumbnail panel, drag scrolls through thumbnails

Function_Description: Vertical scrollbar in comments panel. Scrolls through comment list. Appears when comments exceed panel height.
Expected_Behavior: Scrollbar appears in comments panel, drag scrolls through comments
